title: 'Bathing bar that loves me! :)'
body: My family has been using this product for 5-6 years. I Dove everyday!! :) It's nice and we are kind of addicted to it, so not even thinking of another brand. I have dry skin (likely hereditary) but haven't had any problems over the years, though my eczema hasn't entirely gone away, while I don't use any other moisturizers to note. Among the different colors/scents they are available, I like this Cream Beauty bar (the bar with dark blue label) better than the green tea or pink one.
